Within IOConsoleInputStream a new array can be allocated for input. Therefore 
the monitor owned by sychronize (input) is not adequate for the 
input.notifyAll call later (since the object has changed).

I think the best fix is to change all the synchs on input to be synchs 
on "this" since input is not immutable.
*** Bug 73988 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
